solution_line_template: In one year, Tara's account will yield an interest of {interest_rate_numerator}/{interest_rate_denominator}*{initial_money} = <<{interest_rate_numerator}/{interest_rate_denominator}*{initial_money}={interest_gained}>>{interest_gained} dollars
The total in her account will therefore be {initial_money} + {interest_gained} = <<{initial_money}+{interest_gained}={total_money}>>{total_money} dollars.
